Hello blank fragment Title Emoji Create Delete? No Yes Code Accept 00:00:00:00 Record - 9 day Register Share Sign in New Habit New Habit Attempt - Record Main Subscriptions Settings Reset to Zero?
/Follow On this screen you can watch the success of your subscribers When you click, you can insert a subscription code and observe its habits //Detail Here you can see detailed information about your habits Name of your habit Your name This tag you can observe your progress The timer of your habit When you click on the button, your habit is reset to zero The counter will help you count your attempts Your record score Your history of attempts //Main This is your home screen, here you can see your habits and add them Here will appear your habits that you want to eradicate or introduce into your life When clicked, you can add a new habit and add a smiley face //Setting This is your settings screen By clicking on the button you can register You can share your habits Here you can change the language
